Game.Name: Takahashi Meijin no Shin Bouken-jima (Japan)
Game.plot: This is, in essence, an almost total clone of the original Wonder Boy game, albeit with a few extra bells and whistles. You must run through the levels, jumping pits, avoiding or killing wildlife and collecting fruit to top up your ever-decreasing health.Breaking eggs can yield benefits - from a fast moving skateboard to a fairy that grants invulnerability for a time. Each stage is split into 4 levels, and each of these has a restart point in the middle - and you will need it as one hit spells death.HINTS:- Level select -Enter the cheat on the title.
